pytentd

A python tent.io daemon

  • python A simple programming language.
  • tent.io A protocol for distributed social networking.
  • daemon A process which runs in the background.

Recent News

Version 0.1 Release

Today the first version of pytentd (0.1) was released.

Feature List:

  • Basic server using flask.

  • Models stored using mongodb.

  • Basic server API implementation:

    • Entity headers
    • Core and Basic Profile.
    • Profile modification.
    • Post creation, deletion and modification.
    • Follower relationships.
